basics.name: Anamika Rekha
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: I am a Data Scientist with a solid foundation in data analysis, machine learning, and software development. My expertise spans across Python, SQL, and various data visualization tools like Power BI and Tableau. I have hands-on experience in creating data pipelines, conducting data analysis, and building machine learning models. I am passionate about turning complex data into actionable insights and am continuously learning new tools and technologies to stay ahead in the field.

repository.name: Movie Recommendation System
repository.explanation: Led data cleaning and built collaborative filtering models for predicting user movie ratings.

repository.name: UNICEF Data Warehouse Project
repository.explanation: Managed ETL pipelines and built a robust Star schema for efficient data modeling.

repository.name: Financial Stock Data Analysis Project
repository.explanation: Performed sentiment analysis and developed an LSTM model to predict stock prices.

education.institution: APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University, Kerala, India
